MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:00pm to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network on Gorsehall Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:26pm on Tuesday, 09 March 2021
